dataIdInfo.idPurp: This raster layer shows the wildfire risk of San Diego County, California for the year 2024. It outputs the risk in five distinct risk classes. For further information in how this dataset has been created, please refer to the GitLab repository for this project under the following link: https://git.sbg.ac.at/s1102917/flare
dataIdInfo.idAbs: This raster layer shows the wildfire risk of San Diego County, California for the year 2024. It outputs the risk in five distinct risk classes. For further information in how this dataset has been created, please refer to the GitLab repository for this project under the following link: https://git.sbg.ac.at/s1102917/flare

idCitation.resTitle: Wildfire Risk Map San Diego, California 2024
